page.title: 18THORPE SPORTS & SOCIAL CLUB
page.content: THORPE HAS A SPORTS AND SOCIAL CLUB IN STATION ROAD. IT IS A MODERN BUILDING,ERECTED ON LAND GIVEN TO THE VILLAGE BY LORD BYNG. INSIDE THERE IS A DANCE HALL WHICH IS ALSO USED FOR SNOOKER, BINGO AND DARTS. THERE IS A BAR, A COMFORTABLE LOUNGE, KITCHEN AND CHANGING FACILITIES FOR SPORTS TEAMS. THE CLUB HAS A FOOTBALL TEAM WHICH PLAYS IN THE CLACTON SUNDAY LEAGUE AND USES THE PITCH ON THE PLAYING FIELD BEHIND THE CLUB. DISCOS ARE ARRANGED FOR MEMBERS AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH THROUGHOUT THE YEAR. IN ADDITION, THE SOCIAL CLUB COMMITTEE ALLOWS THE PREMISES TO BE USED BY OTHER ORGANISATIONS IN THE VILLAGE FOR FUNDRAISING DISCOS. THE CARNIVAL QUEEN IS USUALLY CHOSEN AT A SPECIAL DISCO AT THE SOCIAL CLUB.
